title: T-bird not downloading emails
creator: KJS-LES
content:
I can send but not received emails from my several accounts. I know there's email on some, as I can see and read them with Mailwasher.

I have noticed previous posts here with the same problem, but I haven't seen a viable solution. (I'm on a new computer since last week.)

title: Getting new PC, how to install Thunderbird in the new PC, do I need to do anything in this old pc?
creator: Bibb
content:
Hello, I'm getting a new PC next week and I am concerned how to install Thunderbird in the new PC. And is there anything I need to do in the old PC to make the move smooth so it continues to work.

Thank you for your time and efforts ahead of time.

title: Stopped receiving emails today.  Can still send.
creator: KJS-LES
content:
Suddenly today, I can't receive emails from my several email accounts. I can send emails. I know there are emails, since I can see and read them with Mailwasher.

I have seen previous posts here with the same problem, but I didn't see a viable solution. I didn't try the alternate test version - forgot the name and how to access it. (I'm on a new computer since last week.)

title: Herstellen van per ongeluk verwijderde taken.
creator: hhlandleven
content:
Per ongeluk heb ik een aantal taken verwijderd. Ik kan nergens een prullenbak vinden waaruit ik ze terug kan zetten.

Van de calendar-data met de sqlite-bestanden heb ik een kopie gemaakt. Hoe kan ik deleted.sqlite ongedaan maken / mijn taken terug zetten ?

title: unable to open thunderbird emails in waterfox browser
creator: condobloke1
content: Thunderbird 147.0esr Email arrives. I open it It has the usual 'view this thread' link I click that link waterfox opens all of my home pages.....not the email I have disabled all add ons, in both thunderbird and waterfox....I have changed profile in waterfox & synced with firefox.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:140.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/140.0;os:Linux mint 22.3 Cinnamon.

title: Cartella "Posta in arrivo" generale che raccoglie tutte le mail in arrivo da più caselle mail
creator: alinghy
content:
Buongiorno,

mi sono perso... pur dopo tanti anni di utilizzo ormai di Thunderbird con soddisfazione, ho toccato qualcosa nella configurazione di Thunderbird Eclipse rel.147 64 bit e non riesco più a vedere in alto, sopra l'elenco di tutte le cartelle mail presenti, la cartella generale "Posta in arrivo" che una volta cliccata mi faceva vedere in un attimo tutta la posta in entrata, in maniera onnicomprensiva, ovvero tutte le mail in arrivo su ciascuna cartella di indirizzo di posta elettronica presenti nella colonna sottostante. Ho certamente toccato qualcosa inavvertitamente, credo nella barra dei Menù, scelta "visualizzazione " e non riesco a ripristinare il mix di scelte di settaggio per lo stato di visualizzazione globale. Ho anche provato a reinstallare Thunderbird sopra l'attuale, medesime versioni, ma non ne vengo fuori ... se qualcuno può darmi una mano, lo apprezzerei molto ... Grazie anticipatamente Fabio
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;os:Win 11 pro
